about_the_game:
Memorandum
TankWar Nexus is a third-person arcade game that mixes action, adventure and robots on an arduous journey, as you will control a tank in the middle of an island where everyone wants to kill you!

War Machine
In TankWar Nexus, you will control a tank on an island in the south pacific. After your operation fails, you will have to fight with all your strength to get out of that island alive. The war is starting !!!

Fire !!!
Use different weapons to annihilate your enemies: Rocket Launch, machine guns and much more !!!

The adventure begins !!!
Fight different types of enemies, from tanks to giant robots! Face great challenges and become a true hero.
detailed_description:
Memorandum
TankWar Nexus is a third-person arcade game that mixes action, adventure and robots on an arduous journey, as you will control a tank in the middle of an island where everyone wants to kill you!

War Machine
In TankWar Nexus, you will control a tank on an island in the south pacific. After your operation fails, you will have to fight with all your strength to get out of that island alive. The war is starting !!!

Fire !!!
Use different weapons to annihilate your enemies: Rocket Launch, machine guns and much more !!!

The adventure begins !!!
Fight different types of enemies, from tanks to giant robots! Face great challenges and become a true hero.
legal_notice:
Privacy Policy

1. SpartanBloodGames does not collect personal information.
2. As you do not need to provide personal data, we at SpartanBloodGames do not store data, statistics, hardware information, among many other customer data.
3. For not storing personal data, SpartanBloodGames is not responsible for any type of private data of the end user exposed in any way.
4. As it does not store personal data, SpartanBloodGames does not contribute to data sharing, for the purposes of "Targeted Marketing".
name: Tank War Nexus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GForce 920M | ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GForce 920M | ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: In tankWar Nexus, you will fight with different enemies, bosses and challenges that only true heroes can withstand. Are you a hero? Test your ability on TankWar Nexus!
